level.heading: Final accounting.
level.text: Within 30 calendar days after termination of a receivership, the receiver shall give the court a complete accounting of all property with which he or she has been entrusted, all funds collected, and all expenses incurred.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-108
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-108, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 44-1001.01.
